build_web_ui.label: Build Web-UI
build_web_ui.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run web-ui:build
build_web_ui.description: Build web-ui application for production in Docker

build_all.label: Build All
build_all.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run-many -t build
build_all.description: Build all projects in Docker workspace

clean.label: Clean
clean.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx reset
clean.description: Clear Nx cache in Docker container

test_web_ui.label: Test Web-UI
test_web_ui.description: Run web-ui unit tests in Docker (Vitest)

test_config.label: Test Config
test_config.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run config:test
test_config.description: Run config package tests in Docker

test_ui_components.label: Test UI-Comp
test_ui_components.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run ui-components:test

test_all.label: Test All
test_all.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run-many -t test
test_all.description: Run all tests in Docker workspace

lint_all.label: Lint All
lint_all.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run-many -t lint
lint_all.description: Lint all projects in Docker for code quality

lint_all_no_cache.label: Lint (No Cache)
lint_all_no_cache.command: docker exec lkms201-web-ui npx nx run-many -t lint --skip-nx-cache
lint_all_no_cache.description: Lint all projects without Nx cache (fresh check)

docker_start_all.label: ðŸš€ Start All
docker_start_all.command: powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force" & timeout /t 1 & cd services\lkms801-system-ops && start /b cmd /c "python -m app.main > logs\console.log 2>&1" & cd ..\.. & docker-compose up -d
docker_start_all.description: Start LKMS801 native service + all Docker containers

docker_stop_all.label: ðŸ›‘ Stop All
docker_stop_all.command: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [1/8] Stopping LKMS801...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS801' -ForegroundColor Green; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [2/8] Stopping LKMS901 Adminer...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms901-adminer & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS901' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [3/8] Stopping LKMS201 Web-UI...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms201-web-ui & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS201' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [4/8] Stopping LKMS105 Issues...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms105-issues & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS105' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [5/8] Stopping LKMS105 MinIO...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms105-minio & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS105-minio' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [6/8] Stopping LKMS105 DB...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms105-issues-db & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS105-issues-db' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [7/8] Stopping LKMS504 Kafka...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms504-kafka & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS504' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ [8/8] Stopping LKMS503 Zookeeper...' -ForegroundColor Yellow" & docker-compose stop lkms503-zookeeper & powershell -Command "Write-Host 'âœ“ LKMS503' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'âœ… All services stopped!' -ForegroundColor Green"

docker_restart_all.label: ðŸ”„ Restart All
docker_restart_all.command: powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force" & timeout /t 2 & cd services\lkms801-system-ops && start /b cmd /c "python -m app.main > logs\console.log 2>&1" & cd ..\.. & docker-compose restart
docker_restart_all.description: Restart LKMS801 native service + all Docker containers

docker_rebuild_all.label: ðŸ”¨ Rebuild All
docker_rebuild_all.command: powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force" & docker-compose up --build -d & timeout /t 3 & cd services\lkms801-system-ops && start /b cmd /c "python -m app.main > logs\console.log 2>&1" & cd ../..
docker_rebuild_all.description: Stop LKMS801 + rebuild Docker containers + restart LKMS801

docker_down.label: ðŸ—‘ï¸ Down (Remove)
docker_down.command: powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force" & docker-compose down
docker_down.description: Stop LKMS801 + stop and remove all containers (keeps volumes)

docker_clean.label: ðŸ’¥ Clean (+ Volumes)
docker_clean.command: powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force" & docker-compose down -v
docker_clean.description: Stop LKMS801 + stop, remove containers and delete volumes (DESTRUCTIVE!)

docker_list.label: ðŸ“‹ List Containers
docker_list.description: List all Docker containers (running and stopped)

docker_logs_webui.label: ðŸ“œ Logs Web-UI
docker_logs_webui.description: Show last 100 lines of lkms201-web-ui logs

docker_remove_webui.label: ðŸ—‘ï¸ Remove Web-UI
docker_remove_webui.description: Remove lkms201-web-ui container (must be stopped first)

docker_logs_webui_v4.label: ðŸ“œ Web-UI (v4)
docker_logs_webui_v4.description: Show last 200 lines of lkms201-web-ui logs

docker_logs_webui_v3.label: ðŸ“œ Web-UI (v3)
docker_logs_webui_v3.description: Show last 200 lines of lkms201-web-ui-v3 logs

docker_logs_contacts.label: ðŸ“œ Contacts Service
docker_logs_contacts.description: Show last 200 lines of lkms101-contacts logs

docker_logs_contacts_db.label: ðŸ“œ Contacts DB
docker_logs_contacts_db.description: Show last 200 lines of lkms101-contacts-db logs

docker_logs_adminer.label: ðŸ“œ Adminer
docker_logs_adminer.description: Show last 200 lines of lkms901-adminer logs

lkms801_start.label: â–¶ï¸ Start LKMS801
lkms801_start.description: Start LKMS801 System Operations Service (native Windows, hidden)

lkms801_stop.label: â¸ï¸ Stop LKMS801
lkms801_stop.description: Stop LKMS801 service (PowerShell kill pythonw process)

lkms801_restart.label: ðŸ” Restart LKMS801
lkms801_restart.command: powershell -Command "Get-Process pythonw -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.CommandLine -like '*lkms801-system-ops*'} | Stop-Process -Force" & timeout /t 2 & cd services\lkms801-system-ops && pythonw -m app.main
lkms801_restart.description: Restart LKMS801 service (PowerShell stop + wait 2s + start)

lkms801_compile_proto.label: ðŸ”§ Compile Proto
lkms801_compile_proto.description: Compile gRPC proto files for LKMS801

lkms801_logs.label: ðŸ“œ LKMS801 Logs
lkms801_logs.description: Show LKMS801 service logs from file
